title: The metric that predicted Jokić's MVP before anyone else

hook.text:
In 2019, this metric said Nikola Jokić was the most efficient star in the NBA. Everyone laughed.

[On-screen: "THEY CALLED IT CRAZY 😂"]

Three MVPs later... who's laughing now?

explanation.text:
PVR = Production Value Ratio. It measures points created (scoring + assists) per possession used.

[Show 2019 stats: Jokić 42.3 PVR vs League Average ~15]

Everyone saw 20 PPG, 7 APG. Good, not MVP.

PVR saw: elite efficiency, zero wasted possessions, perfect playmaking. MVP-caliber impact.

The difference? PVR counts BOTH scoring AND creating for others.

example.text:
2022 MVP season: 27.1 PPG, 7.9 APG, 44.54 PVR.

[Show comparison: Embiid 35.2 PVR, Giannis 38.1 PVR, Jokić 44.54 PVR]

Highest PVR in the top 15 all-time. The metric was right all along.

[End screen: "PVR KNOWS 🔮"]
